_header: The sinful throats shall be filled among
Subjects: sin, consequences of; tongue, destructive power of; swearers, criticism of; gossips; oaths, criticism of; falseness
_description: The consequences of swearing, or swearing false oaths(?) — three lines, incomplete

Lichfield50.Transcription:
[T]he synful þrotes schuln be fyled amongOf alle þing
                    þar may be bittere and strongSchal be witȝ smoke and fyr
                    medelyd…
Lichfield50.Note: Follows Epilogue to Pricke of Conscience (4401).
